product_desc: Younity Clothing brings consumers and certain philanthropic projects together as one. We bring the idea of Toms shoes into a more local communial effort. As of right now, we have been raising money to help veterans with PTSD by donating $4 of every shirt sale to a program that trains service dogs for veterans. This service is not offered by the Department of Veteran Affairs. YOUnity Clothing wishes to be fill the gap of how local communties seek to assist other disadvantaged populations and finding a way through capitalism to do so. In return, the consumer recieves a high quality product that rivals competitor brands in the stores for the same price. We provide a win/win situation for both the consumer, the disadvantaged and YOUnity Clothing.
name: YOUnity Clothing
